title: Do Senate/ the Senate design still exist?
content: I've noticed a few book covers from the 90s (?) that I really like from these guys but I've never been able to find anything on the web about them. Does anybody know the story with Senate design or if they even exist anymore?
author: nicholasgross

comments.content:
They changed their name to Two Associates.

[http://www.twoassociates.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200402/http:/www.twoassociates.co.uk/ "http://www.twoassociates.co.uk/")
